entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
